# aion

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/aion)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=aion)
<!-- badges: end -->

Temporal Fusion Transformer for keras in R

https://github.com/LongxingTan/Time-series-prediction/blob/master/tfts/layers/nbeats_layer.py

## Installation

You can install the development version of aion from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("krzjoa/keras.tft")
```
